Back to Felix Mendelssohn

Felix Mendelssohn

Sostenuto in F major, MWV U 167

1842

The andante in E-flat major (MWV U 165) and sostenuto in F major (MWV U 167) were composed alongside the Kinderstücke (op. 72), but not included in the final collection.

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 861 · Klavierwerke / Band II · ed. Ullrich Scheideler / Christa Jost
  • Henle · HN 914 · ed. Christa Jost

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2
